EU. 04: 一家机械制造公司 (Italy/意大利)

Profile

It was founded in 1926 in Italy. At today it has more than 90 years history and is a world leader in manufacturing floor type horizontal boring and milling machines, boring and milling machining centers, gantry and table type vertical machining centers, 5 axes machining centers, a full range of roto-traversing tables and attachment heads. Over 80% of production is exported, mainly to China, Germany, US, Russia and India: all countries supported by direct sales and service facilities. It provides machining solutions in various fields of application for machining of heavy workpieces in cast iron, steel and titanium alloy. It is worldwide leader in big machines production: more than 1500 Machines in action worldwide.

简介

成立于1926年，凭借其悠久的企业历史和技术领先的产品，在全球享有盛名。目前其主流产品包括:

  • SPEEDMAT HP –多任务加工中心
  • SPEEDMILL –卧式落地铣床
  • SPEEDRAM HP –落地式镗铣床
  • SPEEDRAM –落地式镗铣床
  • VERTIRAM –龙门加工中心
  • SPEEDMAT –镗铣加工中心

Business Interest

Searching for potential customers such as: Mechanical presses machines, Machine tools for automotive, Plastic machinery, Diesel engines, Hearth moving, Military, Aerospace, Mining and metallurgical machinery, General machinery, Valves manufacturing, Pumps manufacturing, Turbines manufacturing, Rotors manufacturing, Gearboxes manufacturing, Impeller manufacturing, Impeller cases manufacturing etc.

合作需求

寻找潜在客户，本公司产品如：机械压力机，汽车机床，塑料机械，柴油发动机，军事，航空航天，采矿和冶金机械，通用机械，阀门制造，泵制造，涡轮机制造，转子制造，变速箱制造，叶轮制造，叶轮箱制造等。

关于我们

“2018世界制造业大会” 由全球中小企业联盟、联合国工业发展组织、中国人民对外友好协会、安徽省人民政府于2018年5月在合肥共同举办。
